project_descr: Support to institutional development of the Russian Association of People living with HIV (PLHIV)

outputs.output_descr:
The project aimes at providing Russian National Association of PLHIV with technical support in order to establish the nation-wide structure, legal basis and ensure short-term strategic planning for the organization that is expected to act as an official representative of the PLHIV community in Russia.
The project is supported by the GFATM through Healthcare Foundation.

project_title: institutional support to russian association of plhiv
